title: Effective Action for D-branes on SU(2)/U(1) Gauged WZW Model
abstract: Dynamics of D-branes on $SU(2)/U(1)$ gauged WZW model are investigated. We find the effective action for infinite $k$, where $k$ is the level of WZW model. We also consider finite $k$ correction to the effective action which is compatible with Fedosov's deformation quantization of the background.
